attributes.action: The public should have a greater say on what is needed for the London Underground, not the Unions or politicians
attributes.additional_details: Enough strikes. Why is the debate between the politicians and the Unions. The tube is a public service and the public should have a say on what is useful/needed. If a public survey says ticket booth staff are not needed and can be replaced with automation then this should have some sway. The Unions should not be allowed to strike if the public do not need the service the strikers are trying to keep. Power to the customers who pay for the service.
